synopsis.text: The narrative of Baby Steps revolves around Eiichiro Maruo, a dedicated and studious high school freshman with a penchant for achieving straight A's. Growing discontent with his sedentary lifestyle and recognizing the need for physical activity, he stumbles upon a tennis club flyer and decides to give it a shot. Despite his lack of experience and physical prowess, Eiichiro becomes enthralled by the sport of tennis. Utilizing his academic acumen and strategic thinking, he begins to analyze his opponents' playstyles and predict their moves, compensating for his athletic shortcomings. Along his journey, he encounters Natsu Takasaki, a captivating and passionate tennis enthusiast who shares his newfound love for the game. Together, they strive to improve their skills and climb the ranks in the world of tennis, with Eiichiro aspiring to become a professional player. Witness Eiichiro's unique approach to the sport as he harnesses his hardworking nature and analytical abilities to develop his own distinctive playing style in this enthralling tale based on Hikaru Katsuki's original manga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
